DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect Swank Diet ( low saturate fat ) Wahls Elimination Diet ( modify paleo ) fatigue level individual relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis document fatigue . Participants follow usual diet 12 week randomly assign follow one two diet 24 week .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Approaches Treat Multiple Sclerosis-Related Fatigue Study
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare effect Swank Diet ( low saturate fat ) Wahls Elimination Diet ( modify paleo ) fatigue level individual relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis document fatigue . Participants follow usual diet 12 week randomly assign follow one two diet 24 week . Individuals continue current treatment addition follow study diet . The study require four visit University Iowa Hospitals Clinics Iowa City , Iowa . Visits 12 week apart . Study activity include fast blood draw , weigh food record , motor cognitive testing , physical activity assessment , questionnaire , daily diet checklist follow study diet . Some reimbursement available .
